head.title: XML Workbench: XSLT 1.0 (lxml) and XSD 1.1 or 1.0 (xmlschema) powered by Python and Pyodide

section.h2: Features using Pyodide and libxslt and xmlschema

ul.li: XSLT 1.0 (with broad EXSLT support) against XML input using lxml
XSD 1.1 or 1.0 validation of XML input using xmlschema

section.p: Both XSLT transformation as well as XSD validation is happening in a web worker.

With Chromium based browsers like Chrome or Edge you can now open a local file directory and select your main input and XSLT or XSD file and relative includes/imports to modules in the same directory or subdirectories should be resolved.
